org.apache.mesos.offer

Class TaskUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.mesos.offer.TaskUtils

  • public class TaskUtils
extends java.lang.Object
    Various utility methods for manipulating data in TaskInfos.

    • Method Detail

      • toTaskName

        public static java.lang.String toTaskName(TaskID taskId)
                                   throws TaskException
        Converts the unique TaskID into a Framework defined task name. For example: "instance-0__aoeu5678" => "instance-0"
        Throws:
        TaskException

      • toTaskId

        public static TaskID toTaskId(java.lang.String taskName)
        Converts the Framework defined task name into a unique TaskID. For example: "instance-0" => "instance-0__aoeu5678"

        public static TaskInfo setTransient(TaskInfo taskInfo)
        Ensures that the provided TaskInfo contains a Label identifying it as a transient task.

        public static TaskInfo clearTransient(TaskInfo taskInfo)
        Ensures that the provided TaskInfo does not contain a Label identifying it as a transient task.

      • setTaskType

        public static TaskInfo.Builder setTaskType(TaskInfo.Builder taskBuilder,
                                           java.lang.String type)
        Stores the provided Task Type string into the TaskInfo as a Label. Any existing stored task type is overwritten.

      • getTaskType

        public static java.lang.String getTaskType(TaskInfo taskInfo)
                                    throws TaskException
        Returns the task type string, which was embedded in the provided TaskInfo.
        Throws:
        TaskException - if the type could not be found.

      • setOfferAttributes

        public static TaskInfo.Builder setOfferAttributes(TaskInfo.Builder taskBuilder,
                                                  Offer launchOffer)
        Stores the Attributes from the provided Offer into the TaskInfo as a Label. Any existing stored attributes are overwritten.

      • getOfferAttributeStrings

        public static java.util.List<java.lang.String> getOfferAttributeStrings(TaskInfo taskInfo)
        Returns the string representations of any Offer Attributes which were embedded in the provided TaskInfo.

      • setTargetConfiguration

        public static TaskInfo setTargetConfiguration(TaskInfo taskInfo,
                                              java.util.UUID targetConfigurationId)
        Sets a Label indicating the target configuruation for the provided TaskInfo.
        Parameters:
        taskInfo - is the TaskInfo which will have the appropriate configuration Label set.
        targetConfigurationId - is the ID referencing a particular Configuration in the ConfigStore
        Returns:

      • getTargetConfiguration

        public static java.util.UUID getTargetConfiguration(TaskInfo taskInfo)
                                             throws TaskException
        Returns the ID referencing a configuration in a ConfigStore associated with the provided TaskInfo.
        Parameters:
        taskInfo - is the TaskInfo from which the the configuration ID will be extracted.
        Returns:
        the ID of the target configuration for the provided TaskInfo
        Throws:
        TaskException - when a TaskInfo is provided which does not contain a Label with an indicated target configuration

      • setConfigFiles

        public static TaskInfo.Builder setConfigFiles(TaskInfo.Builder taskBuilder,
                                              java.util.Collection<ConfigFileSpecification> configs)
                                       throws java.lang.IllegalStateException
        Stores the provided config file data in the provided TaskInfo's labels field. Any templates with matching paths will be overwritten.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - if the sum total of the provided template content exceeds 100KB (102,400B)

      • getConfigFiles

        public static java.util.Collection<ConfigFileSpecification> getConfigFiles(TaskInfo taskInfo)
                                                                    throws InvalidProtocolBufferException
        Retrieves the config file data, if any, from the provided TaskInfo's labels field. If no data is found, returns an empty collection.
        Throws:
        InvalidProtocolBufferException

        public static java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> fromEnvironmentToMap(Protos.Environment environment)

        public static boolean areDifferent(TaskSpecification oldTaskSpecification,
                                   TaskSpecification newTaskSpecification)

      • packTaskInfo

        public static TaskInfo packTaskInfo(TaskInfo taskInfo)
        Mesos protobuf requirements do not allow a TaskInfo to simultaneously have a Command and Executor. In order to workaround this we encapsulate a TaskInfo's Command and Data fields in an ExecutorInfo and store it in the data field of the TaskInfo.
        Parameters:
        taskInfo -
        Returns:

      • unpackTaskInfo

        public static TaskInfo unpackTaskInfo(TaskInfo taskInfo)
                               throws InvalidProtocolBufferException
        This method reverses the work done in packTaskInfo such that the original TaskInfo is regenerated.
        Parameters:
        taskInfo -
        Returns:
        Throws:
        InvalidProtocolBufferException
